CustomField.formula: NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(TransportationMode__c)) || ISBLANK(TEXT(Status__c)) || ISBLANK(LoadingDate__c) ) && /* TEXT(TransportationMode__c) = TEXT($CustomMetadata.DelayDefine__mdt.CharterDelivery.TransportationMode__c) */ ISPICKVAL(TransportationMode__c, "Charter") && /* 注文の状態は「受付」 */ ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Reception") && NOW() > ( /* 積込日の前日 */ DATETIMEVALUE(LoadingDate__c - 1) + /* 12時JST = 3:00:00Z GMT */ 3/24 )
CustomField.label: チャーター便遅延フラグ
